item.title: Learing IELTS at A Washed-up Nerd
item.description: I planned to relocate as a resident to Canada from the USA after living for about six years in Boston, MA. Through the posts on the hugo and markdown based blog, I review the resources that were helpful in improving writing skills and other free learning series on internet which are promising and guide test takers to attain 8 and 9 bands.
